services.name: arXiv API
services.description: Access to scientific research papers, academic papers, preprints, and scholarly articles from arXiv.org. Search papers, find research, discover academic publications.

intents.name: search_papers
intents.description: Search for research papers by query, author, or category

intents.name: get_paper_details
intents.description: Get detailed information about a specific paper by arXiv ID

intents.name: get_recent_papers
intents.description: Get the most recent papers in a specific category
